taskHydratation.title: 1,5L of water per day
taskHydratation.description: Drink 1,5L of water per day. You can count tea, coffee, but not alcohol!

routine_Hydration_DA.title: Hydration for a Less Irritated Skin
routine_Hydration_DA.medical: Hydration plays a crucial role in maintaining healthy skin, especially when prone to irritation. By maintaining an adequate level of hydration, the skin regains its natural protective barrier, helping to soothe irritations. Proper hydration also promotes cellular regeneration, thereby accelerating the healing process of irritated areas.
